name: Petri Wars (name subject to change)
description:
DISCLAIMER:  Submission updated to prevent fatal build!!!

You are a Nanobot prototype design to fight the spreading virus.

You must manage the ship view as well as inner view of you pilot within the ship.

Taking damage disable one of your ship's functions.

In the inner view you can repair ship functions by accessing terminals.

CONTROLS:

WASD movement.

Mouse to aim.

Left Click to shoot.

Right Click to blink.

Tab to switch screens

Spacebar to repair functions next to a terminal in inner view.

Terminal Locations

Guns - Front Window Panel

Blink - Middle Panel

Engines - Back of Ships
